entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
